misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the greens, is set to make his seventh appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Representing Helsingin Golfklubi, Olli brings a unique blend of intensity and focus to the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his consistent participation underscores his commitment to the event.

Beyond the golf course, Olli maintains an active career as a professional model. This combination of athletic prowess and aesthetic appeal makes him a standout figure in both the sporting and fashion worlds. But it is his lesser-known wrestling skills and intimidating presence that keep his competitors respectful.
Olli's competitive spirit and imposing demeanor ensure that few players dare to challenge him directly. His focus remains steadfast as he aims to make a mark at Hector Trophée 2025.
